thought: The website is accessible. Now I need to extract the text from the HTML to analyze its content for scam characteristics.
observation: The Company  About Us Management Team Careers Lending Services Offered Projects Lending Process Contact Navigation Real Estate Lending CareVest Capital Inc. has been providing customized lending services to the Canadian real estate industry for over 20 years. More info CareVest Capital Inc. CareVest ® Jeevan Khunkhun President Mr. Khunkhun is the President and Director of CareVest Capital Inc. Located in our Vancouver office, Mr. Khunkhun is responsible for sourcing, underwriting, negotiating and managing both new mortgage transactions and existing accounts in British Columbia and Alberta. Prior to joining CareVest in 2006, Mr. Khunkhun was a Senior Manager with Commercial Real Estate Division of Royal Bank of Canada Main Centre, Vancouver. Mr. Khunkhun holds a Bachelor of Commerce degree in Finance from the University of British Columbia, and an MBA from the University of Manitoba. Phone: (604) 629-1837 jeevan@carevest.com Clinton Wark Vice President of Lending Mr. Wark is  Senior Vice-President - Lending and Director of CareVest Capital Inc. Located in our Vancouver office. Mr. Wark is responsible for sourcing, underwriting, negotiating and managing both new mortgage transactions and existing accounts in British Columbia and Alberta. Mr. Wark has over 25 years of experience in the real estate finance industry including direct lending, and mortgage brokerage involving all commercial real estate product types with an emphasis on land development and construction projects. Mr. Wark holds a Bachelor of Commerce (Honors) degree from the University of Manitoba with a major in finance. Phone: (604) 803-8986 clint@carevest.com Thomas Miyazaki Account Manager – Lending Mr. Miyazaki is the Account Manager of Lending for CareVest Capital Inc. located in our Vancouver office. Mr. Miyazaki is responsible for assisting in underwriting loans, tracking and reporting real estate market data, and sourcing new mortgage transactions in British Columbia. Mr. Miyazaki holds a Bachelor of Business Administration from Kwantlen Polytechnic University, a Diploma in Urban Land Economics from the University of British Columbia, and is a CFA® Charterholder. tmiyazaki@carevest.com Privacy Policy Terms of Use Copyright © 2024 CareVest Capital. thought: The website does not have any of the characteristics of a scam website. It provides information about a legitimate company offering lending services in the Canadian real estate industry. There are no signs of unusually low prices, claims of free money, or any other red flags. Therefore, the website is not a scam. {
